resources.string: Lavabit Encrypted Proxy is an easy, fast and secure VPN service from the providers of the most secure email on the planet. Lavabit Encrypted Proxy does not require an user account, keep logs or track you in any way. Learn more at https://lavabit.com/.

By using this application you agree to the Terms of Service available at https://lavabit.com/. This service is provided as-is, without any warranty and is intended for people who value privacy, security and anonymity while using the internet or personal communications.
